topic1Title: I have made applications that rely on realtime databases and unique interfaces
topic1Text: A chat application where all text is written in a Star Wars-inspired style
topic2Title: I'm proficient in various algorithms and audio programming
topic2Text: An app that aims to detect rhythms in music
topic3Title: I have experience in creating large, feature-rich applications and Android development
topic3Text: A program for creating mind maps
topic4Title: I have also developed video games using Unity, Google Cloud and OSM data
topic4Text: An AR golf game played using mobile GPS navigation
topic5Title: I can make complicated layouts and webscraping
topic5Text: CSAMMA (Cosine Search Automatic Mind Map Application) is a full-stack application that automatically creates a mind map from a given website using web scraping and search terms. For example, if you enter the word 'fish' in the search field, the application generates a mind map of website domains related to the word 'fish'.
topic6Title: I can make fullstack applications with Spring and React
topic6Text: Application that can generate assembly recommendations for computer parts based on user choices. The project was originally intended to practice design patterns, and about 12 of them have been used in the project. The application selects compatible components using compatibility data and user preferences regarding price range and computer usage.
goodToKow: Response time is likely to be relatively short
